content:
if seen.contains s then
        continue
      let rfl? ← dischargableWithRfl? r.mctx r.result.eNew
      if cfg.stopAtRfl then
        if rfl? then
          return #[r]
        else
          seen := seen.insert s ()
          acc := acc.push r
      else
        seen := seen.insert s ()
        acc := acc.push r
  return acc
